attributes.action: remove the charter allowing the appleby horse fair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Appleby horse fair is a barbaric event that takes place yearly.
The huge amount of people that attend seem beyond the law & outnumber the police officers by 1000:1 making the event virtually lawless.
Each year horses are taken into the river & ducked three times & are clearly distressed by this process.
Horses are also raced up & down the streets of Appleby with scant regard to public safety.
There are few arrests at the event as the police clearly fear a large scale riot would take place.
We request that the PM petition the Queen to remove the charter for this event.
